DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Bone marrow peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) harvest HLA identical 1 antigen mismatch related donor . PBSC select CD34+ cell T cell deplete . Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 2 hour day -6 -3 anti-thymocyte globulin IV methylprednisolone IV 10-12 hour day -5 -3 . T-cell deplete PBSC bone marrow infuse day 0 . Patients receive cyclosporine IV 12-24 hour day -1 120 follow taper methylprednisolone IV day 7-64 graft-versus-host disease prophylaxis . Patients follow every 30 day 1 year , every 60 day 2 year , need minimum 3 year .
